whatIs.title: What is Picks4All?
whatIs.p1: Picks4All is the free platform to create sports pools online and compete with friends, family, or coworkers by predicting football results. Known as polla futbolera in Colombia, prode in Argentina, penca in Uruguay, or porra in Spain.
whatIs.p2: Create your pool for free, invite anyone with a code, make your predictions and compete on the leaderboard. 100% free with no gambling — just fun and friendly rivalry.

features.title: Everything you need to compete
features.subtitle: A complete platform to organize sports pools with friends, family, or coworkers.

feature1.title: Create your pool
feature1.description: Customize rules, scoring system, and deadlines. You decide how your pool is played.

feature2.title: Live leaderboard
feature2.description: Rankings automatically updated after every match. Always know who's winning.

feature3.title: Flexible predictions
feature3.description: Exact score, match result, goal difference. Multiple ways to earn points with your picks.

feature4.title: Invite friends easily
feature4.description: Share an invitation code via WhatsApp and done. Join in seconds, no hassle.

step1.title: Create or join
step1.description: Create your own pool or join an existing one with an invitation code.

step2.title: Make your predictions
step2.description: Enter your picks before each match deadline.

step3.title: Climb the rankings
step3.description: Earn points with every correct prediction and prove you're the best predictor.
